description:
Error: Runtime Error
Problem Description: When attempting to add a Tuple to a Set, a Runtime Error occurs. This is due to the fact that Sets are not able to accept Tuples as elements, as Tuples are not hashable and Sets require elements to be hashable.
code:
# Create a set 
s = set() 

# Create a tuple 
t = (1, 2, 3) 

# Try to add the tuple to the set 
s.add(t) 

# Print the result 
print
